Orange County Mini-Breeding Bird Surveys

Results -- 2004

SUMMARY -- 2004 (totals and frequencies of all species for all 8 routes)

Results -- all years 1999-2004

SUMMARY -- ALL YEARS (totals and frequencies for all 6 years so far!)

Vireos, warblers, tanagers, orioles are mostly holding their own, although Red-eyed Vireos hit a 6-year low.

Eastern Meadowlarks reveresed their downward trend, and Grasshopper Sparrows were also present in encouraging numbers.

American Crows were at a 6-year low, but Brown-headed Cowbirds were more numerous than ever.
